content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) storing coal

### Copper Ore Mining and Transfer System at Position (-23.0, -68.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) extracting copper ore
- Burner Inserter at position (-24.5, -69.5) transferring ore
- Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing copper ore

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5) storing iron ore

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-19.0, -65.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0) for smelting
- Burner Inserter at position (-20.5, -66.5) transferring materials
- Wooden Chest at position (-16.5, -64.5) storing iron plates

### Iron Plate Transfer System
Consists of:
- BeltGroup connecting from position (-21.5, -63.5) to (-21.5, -66.5)
- BeltGroup connecting from position (-16.5, -64.5) to (-12.5, -58.5)

### Miscellaneous Storage
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) storing coal and iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (3.5, 0.5) empty

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Ensure the target tile is clear before placing a new entity to avoid placement errors.

### Errors with belt connections
- Verify the continuity of belts to prevent gaps that disrupt the flow of materials. Ensure all belts are connected properly without any missing segments.

### Inserter fuel management
- Regularly refuel inserters to maintain their operational status and avoid stoppages due to lack of fuel.
